mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select o.idx, TO_CHAR(o.orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') orderDate, o.status, g.idx goodsIdx, g.img goodsImg, g.name goodsName, g.price goodsPrice from orders o inner join goods g on o.goods_idx = g.idx where o.member_id = #{id} order by o.idx desc) a) where rn between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select TO_CHAR(gc.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, gc.idx reviewIdx, g.idx, g.img, g.name, g.price, round((g.score/g.vote_num),1) result_score, g.vote_num from goodsCollection gc inner join goods g on gc.goods_idx = g.idx where gc.member_id = #{id} and gc.type = #{type} order by gc.idx desc) a) where rn between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select TO_CHAR(gc.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, gc.idx reviewIdx, g.idx, g.img, g.name, g.price, round((g.score/g.vote_num),1) result_score, g.vote_num from goodsCollection gc inner join goods g on gc.goods_idx = g.idx where gc.member_id = #{id} and gc.type = #{type} order by gc.idx) a) where rn = #{page}*10
select count(*) from goodsCollection where member_id = #{id} and type = #{type}
select count(*) from review where member_id = #{id}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select TO_CHAR(r.writeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, r.idx reviewIdx, g.idx, g.img, g.name, g.price from review r inner join goods g on r.goods_idx = g.idx where r.member_id = #{id} order by r.idx desc) a) where rn between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10
mapper.delete: delete from goodsCollection where goods_idx = #{goodsIdx} and member_id = #{memberId} and type = #{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (idx, member_id, goods_idx, star, title, content, writedate) values (REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{member_id}, #{goods_idx}, #{star}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update goods set score = score + #{star}, vote_num = vote_num+1 where idx = #{goods_idx}
update goods set score = score + #{star} where idx = #{goods_idx}
update review set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, star = #{star} where idx = #{idx}
update member set phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
update member set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
